message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Your turn Alice. I think this is a pretty fair offer, slightly more than even considering we lose money each round.
Meet me in the middle, inflation is hurting us both
Okay Alice, let's be serious.  I'll take a smaller gain than my previous offers. This is a good deal for both of us before inflation eats away at it more.
Split it almost evenly, come on Bob, don't be greedy
